TitlePage.Title: &XModAlg;
TitlePage.Subtitle: Crossed modules and cat1-algebras of commutative algebras
TitlePage.Author:
Zekeriya Arvasi zarvasi@ogu.edu.tr http://fef.ogu.edu.tr/zarvasi

Osmangazi University, Eskişehir, Turkey

Department of Mathematics and Computer Science,

TitlePage.Abstract:
The &XModAlg; package provides functions for computation with crossed modules of commutative algebras and cat^{1}-algebras). The current version is &VERSION;, released &LONGRELEASEDATE; for &GAP; 4.7.
Bug reports, suggestions and comments are, of course, welcome. Please contact the second author at aodabas@ogu.edu.tr.
